ValidationRule.description: NICC-032393 - If current status is Closed, User cannot make any further updates to the case (cannot change status or any other fields).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISCHANGED(Description__c), ISCHANGED(Severity__c), ISCHANGED(Subject__c), ISCHANGED(Assignment_Group__c), ISCHANGED(Hotel_Code__c), ISCHANGED(System_Affected__c) ), OR(
ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE (Status__c), "Closed as recovered"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE (Status__c), "Closed as rejected"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE (Status__c), "Closed as withdrawn") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change status or any other fields
